author: poojaranjan
content: ECH has organized a PEEPanEIP meeting forÂ *EIP-3541: Reject new contracts starting with the 0xEF byteÂ * withÂ  <@!425279588009246720> <@!425274498732916736> <@!275684146658148352> today at 1830 UTC.  Zoom link will be shared here for any client team available to join.

author: timbeiko
content:
Given that there are a few JSON-RPC related topics on the agenda for AllCoreDevs, I've put together a document summarizing the outstanding issues and proposals on each: https://notes.ethereum.org/@timbeiko/london-json-rpc

It would be great if each client could at least get familiar with them prior to the call, and ideally leave some comments on this issue (https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/334) with their preferred approach. This way, we can quickly go through the things everyone agrees about on the call.
